info.description: This is a dynamic API generated by PostgREST
info.title: PostgREST API

get.summary: This view contains all speakers identified in Bundestag protocols.
This view contains general information on all the topics identified in Bundestag and Talkshow speeches.
This view contains the summed observed speech time per topic and speaker party (AfD, BSW, BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN, CDU/CSU, Die Linke, FDP, SPD).
This view contains general information about the protocols from the Bundestag and Talkshows.
This view contains the same measurements as topics_view, but for a 4-week window. That means, one row in this view represents one specific topic that was talked about in a specific 4-week window.

get.description:
Paraneters:
    - p_year: Time windows start at this calender year and go up to the latest date
    - p_window_weeks: window size in weeks (e.g. 4)
    
    The output of the function is a table with the same columns as in topics_view_4w
get.summary: This function returns the topic measurements for a user defined timewindow and year.

post.description:
Paraneters:
    - p_year: Time windows start at this calender year and go up to the latest date
    - p_window_weeks: window size in weeks (e.g. 4)
    
    The output of the function is a table with the same columns as in topics_view_4w

schema.description:
This function returns the topic measurements for a user defined timewindow and year.
    
    Paraneters:
    - p_year: Time windows start at this calender year and go up to the latest date
    - p_window_weeks: window size in weeks (e.g. 4)
    
    The output of the function is a table with the same columns as in topics_view_4w

post.summary: This function returns the topic measurements for a user defined timewindow and year.

speakers_view.description: This view contains all speakers identified in Bundestag protocols.

topics_view.description: This view contains general information on all the topics identified in Bundestag and Talkshow speeches.

topic_duration.description: Overall observed speech time spent on topic without differentiating between Bundestag and Talkshows

topic_duration_bt.description: Observed speech time spent on topic in Bundestag

topic_duration_ts.description: Observed speech time spent on topic in Talkshows

bt_normalized_perc.description: Normalized topic speech time in Bundestag in percentages; constructed by dividing the observed time spent on specific topic in Bundestag by the total observed speech time in Bundestag.

ts_normalized_perc.description: Normalized topic speech time in Talkshows in percentages; constructed by dividing the observed time spent on specific topic in Talkshows by the total observed speech time in Talkshows.

bt_share.description: Normalized share of salience in Bundestag in percentages; constructed by dividing the normalized topic speech time of Bundestag with the total normalized topic speech time.

ts_share.description: Normalized share of salience in Talkshows in percentages; constructed by dividing the normalized topic speech time of Talkshows with the total normalized topic speech time.

mismatch_ppoints.description: Difference of normalized topic speech time in Bundestag and Talkshows in percentage points (ranges from -100 to 100); positive means higher salience of topic in Bundestag, negative means higher salience in Talkshows, 0 indicates equal salience.

mismatch_log_ratio.description: Log (base 2) of ratio of normalized topic speech times in Bundestag and Talkshows; generally, positive means higher salience of topic in Bundestag (max: 23.25), negative means higher salience in Talkshows (min: -23.25), 0 indicates equal salience.

topics_duration_by_party_view.description: This view contains the summed observed speech time per topic and speaker party (AfD, BSW, BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN, CDU/CSU, Die Linke, FDP, SPD).

speaker_party.description: Speaker party (filtered to AfD, BSW, BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN, CDU/CSU, Die Linke, FDP, SPD)

topic_duration_per_party.description: Summed observed speech time spent on the topic by the given speaker party

files_view.description: This view contains general information about the protocols from the Bundestag and Talkshows.

file_url.description: Link to either Bundestag protocol in pdf form or Talkshow video on youtube

file_date.description: Date of Bundestag session or Talkshow

source.description: Indicator whether file comes from Bundestag or Talkshows (can be either "bundestag" or "talkshow")

talkshow_name.description: Name of Talkshow (if source is "bundestag" than this columns is also "bundestag")

topics_view_4w.description: This view contains the same measurements as topics_view, but for a 4-week window. That means, one row in this view represents one specific topic that was talked about in a specific 4-week window.

topic_duration.description: Overall observed speech time spent on topic without differentiating between Bundestag and Talkshows

topic_duration_bt.description: Observed speech time spent on topic in Bundestag

topic_duration_ts.description: Observed speech time spent on topic in Talkshows

bt_normalized_perc.description: Normalized topic speech time in Bundestag in percentages; constructed by dividing the observed time spent on specific topic in Bundestag by the total observed speech time in Bundestag.

ts_normalized_perc.description: Normalized topic speech time in Talkshows in percentages; constructed by dividing the observed time spent on specific topic in Talkshows by the total observed speech time in Talkshows.

mismatch_ppoints.description: Difference of normalized topic speech time in Bundestag and Talkshows in percentage points (ranges from -100 to 100); positive means higher salience of topic in Bundestag, negative means higher salience in Talkshows, 0 indicates equal salience.

mismatch_log_ratio.description: Log (base 2) of ratio of normalized topic speech times in Bundestag and Talkshows; generally, positive means higher salience of topic in Bundestag (max: 23.25), negative means higher salience in Talkshows (min: -23.25), 0 indicates equal salience.
